title: The Russian consumer
creator_credit: International Film Foundation and Julien Bryan
brief_description: Discusses the Russian consumer and the prices of the goods and housing availability. After decades of development at the expense of the consumer the Soviet economy now provides a higher standard of living, however, improvements remain out of reach of most of the peasants.
